content: Instead of continuing up the steps to the Warding Temple from the Warding Temple Keeper's Shrine, turn to the side and drop down to the snowy hill below. Start working your way up the hill. The Falcon Hermit will appear on top of a rock on the left.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Falcon_Hermit_Spirit.md", within the section "Falcon Hermit Spirit" and the sub-section "Falcon Hermit Location". The content is presented below:

Instead of continuing up the steps to the Warding Temple from the Warding Temple Keeper's Shrine, turn to the side and drop down to the snowy hill below. Start working your way up the hill. The Falcon Hermit will appear on top of a rock on the left.
